two_fa#code_verify_login_text: Enter the code from your app here
two_fa#code_verify_text: Enter the code generated by your authentication app
two_fa#first_item_text: Open your authentication app. If you don't already have one, we recommend Duo, Authy, or Microsoft Authenticator.
two_fa#second_item_text: Using the app, scan the QR code or manually enter the following code:
index_page#hero_title: Explore modern auth features with this demo app
index_page#hero_subtitle: Click the <0>Sign In</0> button above to start exploring
index_page#card_jwt_text: JWT based authentication, yet with immediate feedback on user rights changes
index_page#card_oauth_text: Authentication via social networks without any restrictions
index_page#card_2fa_text: Two-factor authentication with resource control based on 2FA status
index_page#card_password_text: Everything you need for changing, restoring, and creating passwords
index_page#card_account_text: A single account, regardless of the login method used
index_page#card_advanced_text: One login only, OAuth and 2FA together, impersonation, and more
index_page#main_title: All-in-One Auth Starter Kit with Node.js
index_page#basic_feature_remeber_me: 'Remember me' feature to stay logged in
index_page#basic_feature_email_rbac: Access based on the email verification status
index_page#basic_feature_request_passwor: As admin request a user to change the password
index_page#basic_feature_new_login: As admin request a user to re-login
index_page#advanced_feature_restore_acco: Send the link to restore the deleted account
index_page#advanced_feature_link_oauth: Link local account with OAuth accounts
index_page#advanced_feature_prevent_oaut: Prevent some user roles to use OAuth
index_page#advanced_feature_require_pass: Require password check for the critical actions
index_page#advanced_feature_cross_tab_au: Sync auth status across browser tabs
index_page#security_section_title: Keep your most important assets with you
index_page#security_section_text1: Today, businesses gravitate towards the cloud-based solutions, seeking simplicity even at the cost of losing control. Canceling your account can be done in a second, building a user base is an endeavor that spans years.
index_page#security_section_text2: With this starter kit, you will obtain a high-quality authentication solution that ensures all user data is securely stored in your own database and advanced authentication technologies remain in your own hands.
pages#need_email_verify: You have to verify your email to view this page
pages#logged_with_email: You are logged in with the verified email: {{email}}
pages#logged_in: You are logged in with the email: {{email}}
pages#roles_missing: You do not have the required roles to view this page
pages#enable_2fa: Please enable two-factor authorization in the
pages#enable_2fa_admin: Admin access requires 2FA. Please enable two-factor authorization in the
pages#enable_admin_role: Please promote yourself to admin in the
workspace_page#intro_text_1: This demo app demonstrate 26 features related to authentication and security.  Below are the instructions how to find them and see them in action.  The features are split into basic and advanced categories. The basic features are numbers B1-B13, advanced features are numbered A1-A13.
workspace_page#intro_text_2: You can get the code from <0>GitHub</0> of both backend and frontend applications and play with it locally. Instructions how to configure a local environment can be found in respective repositories.
workspace_page#intro_text_3: The detailed explanation of the advanced features can be found in this <0>Blog</0>
workspace_page#feature_list_title: Features that are not shown in the screenshots above
workspace_page#feature_text_b7: After signing up, a verification email is sent to the specified email address.
workspace_page#feature_text_a1: After the user clicks “Delete Account,” an email with an account restoration link is sent.
workspace_page#feature_text_a2: Accounts are linked automatically based on the email address.
workspace_page#feature_text_a3: This is managed via the configuration table. In the Demo app, users with admin roles cannot use OAuth.
workspace_page#feature_text_a6: This process is automatic. When the user loads the app, the JWT token is recreated with the same parameters, thereby extending its validity time.
workspace_page#feature_text_a9: This is managed via the configuration table. The Demo app is not configured to demonstrate feature A10 (Logout from all devices). If activated, signing in on one device will automatically sign the user out from all other devices.
workspace_page#feature_text_a12: This is implemented using the ‘passwordCheck’ middleware. In the demo app, it's set up for feature A11 (Impersonation).
workspace_page#feature_text_a13: This is a frontend feature, implemented using the Broadcast Channel API.
workspace_page#flicence_text_1: The backend source code, which is the main part of this application, is licensed under the MIT license. This means you can use it however you want, including for unlimited commercial purposes.
workspace_page#flicence_text_2: The frontend part of the application is for demo purposes only, allowing you to see the authentication features in action and experiment with it in your local or development environment.
